title: Please Help!!
content:
I am trying to ID the font from this logo. Any help is greatly appreciated.

Thanks!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081201172648im_/http:/typophile.com/files/rushcreek_scan_3960.jpg)

 [‹ (x) The Anti Pizza Face script on shirt - Ariston {Brett J, Patricia}](http://web.archive.org/web/20081201172648/http:/typophile.com/node/38137 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) The Fat Font Fad - list {Stephen} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081201172648/http:/typophile.com/node/42643 "Go to next forum topic")
author: randy72

comments.content:
Looks like [ronda](http://web.archive.org/web/20081201172648/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/ef/itc-ronda/ronda-ef/) with a modified “c”

p@rick
